name: Podio LL Cards Avatars Hidden
description: Hides the avatars (profile picture as thumbnail) on the cards.
additional_info:
1) Requires "Podio: Lots and lots of misc tweaks" by "Luke Abell".
https://userstyles.org/styles/99429/podio-lots-and-lots-of-misc-tweaks
2) Requires the base style "Podio LL Cards" by "LabersLab"
https://userstyles.org/styles/107422/podio-ll-cards
3) Further additions to the base style are available, if desired.
